Bisa Butler (ónyé amụrụ Mailissa Yamba Butler na 1973) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na-ese eriri nke mepụtara ụdị akwa ọhụrụ nke gbanwere onye na-ese okwu. Ọ bụ ezie na a na-ewere akwa akwa dị ka ọrụ aka, usoro ya na-ejikọta - nke na-emepụta akwa nke yiri ihe osise - emeela ka akwa dị n'ọhịa nka dị mma.A maara ya maka ihe osise ya na-eme ka ndụ ndị isi ojii na-eme emume, na-egosi ma ndị mmadụ kwa ụbọchị na ndị ama ama n'akụkọ ihe méré eme. Ọrụ ya ugbu a so na nchịkọta na-adịgide adịgide na Smithsonian National Museum of African American History and Culture, Art Institute of Chicago, na ihe dị ka ụlọ ngosi nka iri na abụọ ọzọ na mba ahụ.O gosikwara na Smithsonian Museum of American History, Epcot Center, National Underground Railroad Freedom Center, na ọtụtụ ebe ndị ọzọ.N'afọ 2020, e nyere ya ọrụ ka ọ kpuchie ihe oyiyi màkà magazin Time, gụnyere mbipụta "Onye nke Afọ" na mbipụta "100 Women of the Year". Site na ndepụta ọtụtụ afọ na-echere maka ọrụ onwe ónyé, otu n'ime akwa Butler rere na ire ere na 2021 maka $ 75,000 USD.

Butler gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nka dị mma ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ cum laude na Mahadum Howard, ébé ọ gụrụ ọrụ Romare Bearden, gaa nkuzi nke ndị omenkà ojii a ma ama dị ka Lois Mailou Jones, ma mụọ n'okpuru ndị nkụzi dị ka Elizabeth Catlett, Jeff Donaldson, na Ernie Barnes. Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ise ihe, mana o kwuru na ya na onye na-ese ihe na-emetụta ya n'ezie. Ọ malitere iji ákwà rụọ ọrụ, na-eme collages na ákwà.
